vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀναζάω,
infinitive -ζῆν, return to life, be alive again, [NT]: in Epic dialect form ἀναερτ-ζώω [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to live again, recover life, revive, Rom. 7:9; metaphorically to live a new and reformed life, Lk. 15:24, 32*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: volver a la vida; cobrar vida (el pecado)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 死而復生
1a) 肉身的復活 (羅 14:9; 啟 20:5)
1b) (靈性與道德上的) 復生 (路 15:24)
2) 重現生機 (羅 7:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 死而复生
1a) 肉身的复活(罗14:9; 启20:5)
1b) (灵性与道德上的) 复生(路15:24)
2) 重现生机(罗7:9)
